mean_cn: adj. 应用的，实用的；  v. 应用，实施，敷上
mean_en: (especially of a subject of study) used in a practical way; not theoretical.
sentence: Applied mathematics has practical uses in many fields, such as biology and computer science.
sentence_trans: 应用数学适用于众多领域，比如生物学和计算机科学。
word_etyma: appl(y)应用 + i + ed形容词后缀 → applied应用的
